fields.headline: Trying out Panther
fields.bodyText: Just installed OSX 10.3 (Panther) on the Mac at home - initial reaction is that it does all it promises on the tin. Multi-user switching works fine, the new Finder is a great improvement and - best of all - the whole system is a lot more responsive. Applications are loading much, much faster. Tomorrow I'm going to delve into the improved Mail app...
